archimate:SystemSoftware.name: MiddleManager
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
Ingests and publishes data from source systems, including Druid itself.
MM and Indexers do ingestion and store the most recent (last hour or two) data.
MiddleManager is in the middle of transfering to Indexers (alpha feature) - there's no strong push to use it currently.
There are two types of ingestion: seekable-stream and batch.
This process scales based on how much data you'll be ingesting.
